author: Daniel Bennett
comment: Needs more options like brightness and battery level but when set to black makes a perfect sleeping watch because you can check the time without going blind at night
title: Good but could be better

author: Patrick
comment: Looks great at night.  Keep up the good work guys.
title: Great

author: Charlie Rappa
comment: Awesome. Needs battery meter on face though

author: Mamma Yo
comment: I have the moto360. I open app n pick a colof n doesnt do anything. Cant get face to show on my watch. Is there another step im not doing???

reply.author: Pavel Pro
reply.content:
In your watch if you choose the "Settings -> Change watch face" new styles do not appear? You see any error when installing an application? 
Try in your phone in the application "Android Wear" go into the settings and select the menu item "Resync Apps", and then after 20-30 seconds to check whether there were new styles on the watch.

title: Dsnt work
